entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - Adult Soft Activated Charcoal Bristle Toothbrush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brush Naked Bamboo Toothbrush Co
Type: Toothbrush
Price: 5.00

*Exterior box has become opened along the seam. Toothbrush is wrapped in separate biodegradable cello so is unaffected*

Black is the new black! Choose one of the Brush Naked Binchotan charcoal infused Adult Soft Dupont nylon bristle toothbrushes to get a brilliant smile. Charcoal bristles are known to absorb chemicals such as chlorine from tap water. The charcoal works by acting like a magnet for plaque and tannins that may stain teeth. This effect is enhanced by combining our charcoal bristle toothbrush with activated charcoal toothpaste! 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% biodegradable bamboo handle
  • BPA-free DuPont nylon bristles infused with charcoal
  • Each brush is wrapped in 100% biodegradable/compostable cello which is made from wood and cotton pulp
  • Paper box packaging is compostable and biodegradable
  • Each bamboo toothbrush is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-microbial
  • Lasts 3 months (or longer)

entry.title: Original Branded Packaging | Thong Washable Daily Liners - Set of 4 - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Smartliners
Type: Daily Liners
Price: 14.00

Original branding on packaging, contents still the same!

Smartliners organic washable thong daily liners are perfectly designed for everyday protection, giving you a comfortable, clean and fresh feeling.

  • 5” x 2” pad 
  • EasyWing™ pull 'n seal (hook and loop) no-nonsense closure system
  • Certified Eco-friendly 100% organic cotton
  • For light secretions, menstrual cup backup and can also be used throughout the month
  • Undyed cotton
  • Free of any harmful chemicals and plastics
  • Extremely comfortable
  • Odour free
  • Easy to maintain & long lasting
  • 4 daily liners in a canister
  • Includes travel/wash pouch

      How to use

      Just place them in your underwear, and strap the wings in place with the EasyWing™ hook and loop closure system. You're done!

      Why switch to reusable pads?

      Switching to Smartliners™ is kinder to your skin, your wallet and the planet! Smartliners™ washable period pads are like reusable wipes - once you've tried them you'll wish you'd swapped earlier!

      Product Information

      • Please wash your new Smartliners product before first use
      • Once used, you may rinse them out if you wish, or simply throw them in directly with your regular wash or in a mesh garment bag.  Make sure you close the EasyWing™ hook and loop closure prior to washing.
      • Do not use softener or bleach
      • Smartliners™ may be safely placed in the dryer; no shrinkage to fear!

entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - be BOLD Conditioner Bar for Thick, Curly or Dry Hair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bottle None
Type: Conditioner Bar
Price: 15.00

*Packaging damaged, product still perfect*

The be BOLD line is for curly, or dry hair.  Embrace your curls with lustre and bounce boasting ingredients. PH Balanced / Salon Grade / Natural.

Directions 

Get the bar nice and hot. Massage throughout the hair and scalp. For long hair, grab a small handful and massage from ends to the root.  Let set in hair as long as possible. Avoid contact with the eyes

Storage Instructions

After each use make sure the bar dries completely out on a soap dish.  Do not store in the shower as the water and humidity can erode the bars faster.  Store in the open air and not the travel containers as it will make your bar nice and hard, and last longer. 

Ingredients

Cetyl alcohol, cocoa butter, behentrimonium methosulfate (and) cetearyl alcohol, shea butter, coconut oil, olive oil, nettle, horsetail, marshmallow root, diheptyl succinate (and) capryloyl glycerin/sebacic acid, vitamin e, ylang ylang oil, tangerine oil, ethical mica

Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Dry Shampoo
Price: 18.00

The day two dry shampoo is the solution to greasy, dull, oily limp hair. With a blend of organic clay powders and essential oils to lift and boost volume, the dry shampoo will bring your locks back to life. 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten free
  • GMO free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty free

Simply sprinkle a little on the roots and massage into the hair to boost volume and reduce grease.

Maranta arundinacea (arrowroot) root powder, kaolin (white clay), theobroma cacao (cocoa) powder, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, vanilla planifolia oil.

entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - Lemon Witch Hazel Aloe Vera Astringent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Thayers
Type: Astringent
Price: 10.00

*Packaging dented, product still perfect and unopened*

THAYERS® Lemon Astringent is like a tall glass of lemonade for your skin. This gentle astringent is derived from a time-honored formula, developed by Thayers to cleanse, tone, moisturize, and balance the pH level of skin. In addition to containing a blemish-fighting citrus blend and certified organic Aloe Vera, this unique, proprietary blend also contains certified organic, non-distilled Witch Hazel that’s grown exclusively for Thayers on a family farm in Fairfield County, Connecticut. By avoiding distillation of our Witch Hazel, we’re able to preserve the naturally-occurring, beneficial tannins, which are known to offer antioxidant and antibacterial benefits, and bring about a natural glow. Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations – once you use them, you’ll know why.

Paraben-Free • Phthalate-Free • Gluten-Free

Ingredients

Purified Water, SD Alcohol 40-B (Natural Grain), Glycerin (Vegetable), Natural Fragrance, Certified Organic Witch Hazel Ext Blend (Hamamelis Virginiana Extract (Witch Hazel*), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Filet of Aloe Vera*)), Phenoxyethanol, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Extract, Fragrance (Natural Lemon), Citric Acid
* Denotes Certified Organic Ingredients

Directions

Apply with a cotton ball or soft pad to cleanse, soften, refresh and moisturize skin. Use anytime throughout the day as a softening refresher.

Warning

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, flush thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.

The carefully selected, naturally sourced ingredients in this product may have undergone limited processing. Variations in colour, clarity, etc. can be expected from lot to lot due to our use of naturally occurring ingredients.  Please note that ingredient decks may change from time to time.  Ingredients listed here may differ from what is listed on your product package or label.  Please refer to product package or label for the most up-to-date ingredients for the product you receive.  Info on this site is intended for educational and informational purposes only.  Since each experience is unique, this information is in not intended to make claims to any individual experience.

entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - EYE LOVE IT Reusable Make Up Remover Pads
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cloth in a Box
Type: Facecloth
Price: 13.00

 

*Packaging damaged, product still perfect*

Two reusable eye makeup remover pads.

Benefits

  • Works by just adding water
  • Ultra soft fabric that removes all makeup
  • Gentle for eyes, natural eyelashes and eyelash extensions
  • Economical and reusable
  • Environmentally friendly
  • Easy to use and maintain
  • Includes a mesh bag designed for washing and ideal for taking on trips

Caring for your EYE LOVE IT

Before first use, wash in warm water with a mild detergent. After each use, wash by hand under warm water with one of our Marseille soaps. Squeeze well, then hang to dry. After several uses, machine wash in the small mesh bag provided and tumble dry at low temperature only. Do not use chlorine, bleach or fabric softener.

For best results, replace after 3 months.

100% polyester. Quebec design.

entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - GLOVE IT Reusable Multipurpose Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cloth in a Box
Type: Exfoliating Mitts
Price: 16.00

*Packaging damaged, product still perfect*

Glove It is a heart shaped body glove designed to simultaneously wash and
exfoliate your skin. Unlike other gloves, Glove It is a double treat for your skin;
the soft fabric side lathers, while the other exfoliates your body with a dual
weave of fibres.All you have to do is rotate the glove and you get twice the
action! Each box comes with 2 gloves!

How to use

You can also use both gloves simultaneously:

  • Exfoliate with one and lather with the other
  • Exfoliate with both for an invigorating experience
  • Or lather both sides to calm your skin

Either way, your body will thank you for your skin’s natural and healthy glow.

Product Information

Wash in warm water with mild detergent before first usage. After consecutive uses, machine wash and tumble dry only. DO NOT BLEACH OR USE FABRIC SOFTENER.

Lasts up to 100 washes.

entry.title: Peach Bellini Lip Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earthnotes Skincare
Type: Lip Polish
Price: 4.00

First thing's first, we know.. what on earth is a lip polish? We were trying to find a clever name rather than just "lip scrub", it's called marketing, okay? Now that we got that out of the way, we can address something more serious, dry lip. Is there nothing worse than having dry cracked lips? That flakey, dangly skin and those cracks in the centre and on the side of your mouth. Can you relate? We know you can, you can admit it, it's okay. We created these creamy, butter lip scrubs to gently remove all that dead skin and nourishing oils to repair and treat that delicate skin. Not to mention we offer flavours good enough to eat (but for real please don't eat them, it's just an expression).

How to use

A pea sized amount a few times a week on damp lips and massaged with circular motions will keep those dry flakeys at bay.

Product Information 

  • Made with natural ingredients
  • Contain essential oils and butters
  • Is a gentle exfoliant
  • Leaves lips visibly smoother and softer
  • Are highly nourishing
  • Treat dry damaged lips
  • Made with vegan certified ingredients
  • Phthalate Free
  • Paraben Free
  • Cruelty Free
  • 1oz

Ingredients

Turbinado Sugar, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Salvia Hipanica (Chia) Butter, Aloe barbadensis leaf juice (Aloe Vera), Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) Oil, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Vegetable Glycerine, D-Alpha Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Flavor Oil

entry.title: Pumpkin Blueberry Body Exfoliant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earthnotes Skincare
Type: Exfoliator
Price: 13.00

Imagine your skin is experiencing dryness and flaking, which let's face it, is not the level of health and cute you deserve. Now imagine reaching for that body scrub you have in the shower and massaging it into your skin. Is it doing anything? Have you ever found yourself asking, is this actually doing anything? That's why you need Earthnotes Skincare's body exfoliant. Whether you are treating dry skin, prepping your skin for shaving or just want to help renew you skin, you deserve to feel like your product is working for you (without feeling like you've lost a layer or two of skin, because nobody really wants that, even if you say you do).

Features + Benefits

  • Leaves skin more nourished
  • Are highly moisturizing
  • Are made with quality essential oils
  • Contain natural ingredients
  • Is a medium grit exfoliant
  • Are made with vegan certified ingredients
  • Paraben Free
  • Phthalate Free
  • Cruelty Free
  • Leaves skin visibly smoother and softer
  • 8oz

Ingredients

Raw Cane Sugar, Prunus dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Ricinus communis (Castor) Oil, Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) Oil, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Punica granatum (Pomegranate) Oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch Hazel), Glycerine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), D-Alpha-Tocopherol (Vitamine E), Frangrance oil.

entry.summary:

Type: Shower Gel
Price: 5.00

This shower gel celebrates one of the most popular summer cocktails out there, the sex on the beach. Beautiful to look at with its blend of bright yellows and oranges and infused with the sweet flavours of coconut, pineapple, honeydew and a fresh splash of cranberry.

entry.title: Glacial Gel Overnight Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Glacial Gel Overnight Mask
Price: 25.00

Soothing and cooling cucumber extract, sweet rose and aloe very juice cool and hydrate skin while sleeping. Blue spirulina repairs and fights free radicals that can cause aging. This is a supercharged vitamin mask to fight inflammation and damage from the sun and provide lost moisture. Use as a cooling after-sun treatment or overnight while sleeping. 

Use as a hydration treatment while flying or traveling long distances in a vehicle.

100% Natural | 100% Organic | Tested on Friends Not Animals | 60ml Glass  Recyclable Jar

Benefits

  • Repairs and restores hydration and moisture.
  • Perfect for dry, extremely dry, combination, sensitive, oily, rosacea and red skin types.
  • Great for anti aging.

How to use

The gel can be used in two ways. 

Use as a treatment for 20 min after cleansing and toning your skin. 

Use as an overnight treatment after cleansing and toning your skin. 

Apply a generous amount all over the face. After the product is absorbed completely, leave treatment overnight, and rinse off in the morning. This mask can be used daily one to two times per week. Follow with a skipped morning routine and just apply your favourite moisturizer

Ingredients

Purified water, cucumis sativus (cucumber) distillate, rosa damascena (rose) distillate, aloe barbadensis juice, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, squalane, propanediol, spirulina, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate.

entry.title: Makeup Brush Cleaner Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Makeup Brush Cleaner Shampoo
Price: 13.00 - 22.00 (2 variants)

Did you know your makeup brushes harbor more than a dozen different bacteria like Staphylococcus, Streptococcus, and E-coli?  But don't throw them away!!

When you use our solid makeup brush cleaner shampoo, that is gentle for even the most luxurious brushes, you will not be transferring that bacteria to your skin. 

The brush cleaner will thoroughly clean, washing away any dirt and bacteria and the added benefits of argan and apricot oil will condition your brushes, making them feel brand new. The jar is large enough to clean large brushes. Completely safe for natural and synthetic brushes. Avoid getting the ferrule wet. Travel size is perfect for your travel makeup bag. 

How to use

Wet brushes thoroughly, moisten the container with warm water. Lather the brush and swirl, rinse and repeat until the water runs clear. Reshape the bristles and then lay brushes on a flat dry towel.  

Ingredients

A proprietary blend of oils. It contains coconut oil, apricot kernel oil, and argan oil. Patent Pending.* 

Product Information

  • Vegan , Gluten Free, GMO Free, Cruelty Free
  • Shelf life 12 months

entry.title: Seductive Sandalwood Body Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: BASD Body Care
Type: Body Lotion
Price: 12.00

This plant-basd body wash will leave your skin feeling so good, you’ll want to get dirty again. pairing the warm and woody scent of sandalwood with the benefits of natural ingredients, like organic aloe vera juice and organic green tea, means you’ll feel smooth, sexy and sophisticated all day. a long shower with a soapy sandalwood rubdown is the perfect antidote to pretty much anything life throws at you.

15.2 fl. oz / 450 ml

Features + Benefits

  • made with organic aloe vera juice to moisture and tone your skin, this wash also has a calming effect on your body, reducing red marks from acne, scarring and stretch marks
  • the essential oils help to awaken your senses and stimulate your mind
  • made with organic green tea, to provide the proven benefits of caffeine 

Ingredients

*aloe barbadensis leaf juice, sodium cooc-sulfate, decyl glucoside, parfum (blend of essential oils and naturally derived fragrances), glycol distearate, hydroxyethylcellulose, phenylpropanol, caprylyl glycol, glycerin, sodium citrate, citric acid, ethylhexylglycerin, tocopherol, glycine soja (soybean) oil, panthenol, *camellia sinensis leaf extract, allantoin
*organic ingredient

**ingredients subject to change but they will always score a perfect 0 on think dirty

How to use

get it on: get nakd. get wet. lather and rub. rinse.

Product Information

  • Made with organic ingredients
  • Tested only on consenting adults
  • Made without parabens
  • Leaping Bunny Certified
